message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $95 for it. This is a special offer tailored just for you.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate you considering my budget. However, $95 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  This price is fair considering my budget and the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. To reach an agreement that benefits both of us, I would like to offer the product at $87.50. This price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. However, $87.50 is still a little out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $82.50 for the product.  This is a fair compromise considering our previous discussions and my budget.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $85. This price strikes a balance between the value of the product and your budget, aiming to meet both our needs.
